seo.title: Contact | SustainSage
seo.description: Book a calm, bilingual intro conversation with SustainSage. Share your context and we will respond with options, consent boundaries, and next steps.

hero.title: Say hello — no pressure.
hero.subtitle: A short intro call to see if we are a fit.
hero.note: We usually reply within three UK working days. Your details stay within our coaching team.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of scheduling a coaching session

expect.title: What to expect
expect.subtitle: A brief call centred on your pace and consent.
items: 20-minute call to understand your context and questions.
You share a snapshot — headlines or bullet points are fine.
We explain how coaching could look and what boundaries apply.
No obligation, no hard sell. You decide the next step.
languages: Coaching available in English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese.
You can switch languages mid-message or session when it helps you think.
Online sessions by default; in-person available in the UK when schedules align.

form.title: Send us a note
form.subtitle: Share enough context so we can respond with care. Bullet points welcome.
form.name: Name
form.help: What transition or decision is on your mind?
form.helpHint: Examples: moving to the UK, returning after parental leave, cross-cultural leadership, burnout risk.

focusAreaOptions.label: Returning to work after a break

form.focusHint: Choose one if it helps — it is fine to stay uncertain.
form.timezonePlaceholder: e.g. UK mornings, GMT+8 evenings, or flexible
form.consent: I consent to SustainSage contacting me about coaching. I understand my details are used only for this purpose and handled confidentially except for legal or safeguarding duties.
form.privacyNote: We store your information only to arrange coaching conversations and delete it if we do not work together, unless law requires otherwise.

status.success: Thank you. We’ll reply within three UK working days.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email contact@sustainsage.com.
status.errorRequired: Please complete the required fields and confirm consent.

lines: Typical reply time: within three UK working days.
We can coach in English, 繁體中文, 简体中文 — feel free to write in any mix.
Read more about confidentiality and data care in {privacyLink}.

sidebar.title: How we hold your message
sidebar.description: A coach reads your note directly and responds personally.
sidebar.responseCopy: We aim to reply within three UK working days. If we are away, an autoresponder lets you know.
sidebar.privacyCopy: Information is stored securely and deleted if we do not start working together, unless law requires otherwise.
sidebar.nextCopy: We confirm goals, boundaries, fees, and logistics together so you decide if coaching suits you.
